title: Expanding Textarea
description: Displays a textarea which autoexpands (or shrinks) based on its content.

body.raw:
<ComponentPreview name="expanding-textarea-demo" peekCode wide />

## Usage

```tsx
import { ExpandingTextArea } from 'ui'
```

```tsx
<ExpandingTextArea />
```

## Examples

### Default

<ComponentPreview name="expanding-textarea-demo" peekCode wide />

import { ExpandingTextArea } from 'ui'

export function ExpandingTextareaDemo() {
  const [value, setValue] = useState('')

  return (
    <ExpandingTextArea
      placeholder="Type your message in multiple lines here."
      value={value}
      onChange={(event) => {
        setValue(event.target.value)
      }}
    />
  )
}
